headline: Medtronic plc (MDT) Gains Momentum Through Diabetes and Cardiovascular Operations
summary: Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT) is one of the 10 best healthcare equipment stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On February 19, Truist analyst Richard Newitter reduced the price target on Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT) from $107 to $103, while maintaining a Hold rating. Newitter noted that the company delivered modest organic revenue and a slight EPS […]

headline: 2026 DORIAN AWARDS RECOGNIZE GLOBAL LEADERS IN STRUCTURED PROBLEM-SOLVING EXCELLENCE
summary: The 2026 Dorian Awards recognize global leaders delivering measurable bottom-line impact through structured problem-solving. This year's honorees include Robert Bosch, Yamaha, and Medtronic, representing organizations across North America, Europe, Asia, and South America.

headline: Is It Time To Reconsider Medtronic (MDT) After Mixed Long Term Share Returns
summary: If you are wondering whether Medtronic is fairly priced right now or quietly offering value, this article walks through what the current market price might be telling you. The stock last closed at US$96.86, with an 11.1% return over the past year, a 27.9% return over three years and a 3.8% decline over five years, which gives mixed signals about how investors have been viewing its prospects. Recent headlines for Medtronic have focused on the business as a major medical technology player in...
